description: Rim with a 'gros bleu marbrè' ground and bands of gilt neo-classical inspiration. Center painted with two branches of a yellow flower with lush, thick foliage, the cavetto with a gilt band of laurel leaves.
markings: Mark: \'SÉvres 32\' printed wafer mark in black Inscription: \'Enothère à grands fleurs (Vulg: Onagre)\' in black enamel script; the letters \'mbw\' in gold by the rim, and 26a\' 28 in green; incised 29-5.
title: Botanical Plate
